system.description: Effect: The user selects a Movement Type they possess and make a Skill Check with that Movement Type's associated Skill. On a success, the +1 per 2 DoS to that Movement Score for the rest of the round. You may elect to spend up to 6 PP to increase the number of DoS by the number of PP spent.

actions.name: Rush
actions.description: Effect: Select a Movement Type that you possess. Make a Skill check for that Movement Type's associated Skill, and add 1 +2 per DoS to that Movement Score for the rest of the round.
